(3) Fast & Accurate GPS Tracking.

【USA EDITION 2024 + LIFETIME MAP UPDATES】The Latest Maps for the USA, Canada and Mexico & comes with lifetime map updates for any future road changes and NEW roads *100% no subscriptions or sim cards required, be careful of devices that have unadvertised hidden fees!*

【9inch BIG screen for truck】: NAVRUF brings a 9-inch high-resolution and large screen, HD display providing clearer viewing for poor eyesight, can be seen in bright sunlight, say goodbye to silly sunshades, upgraded internal memory 3x faster buffering.

【REAL VOICE NAVIGATION】: Choose from a selection of voices that will provide you turn by turn voice navigation. Real man or woman voice broadcast you don’t have to look on the GPS screen all the time. It makes your driving safer, reduce fatigue driving, away from the ticket. Other Security Alert Types: Average Speed Camera, Red Light Camera ,Railway Crossing, High Accident Zone,City Entry Piont, Dangerous Area etc.

【Professional Solution】NAVRUF GPS navigation supply regular maps upgrades and any question inquiry. USA local brand, established professional technician team in the United States, have been recognized by our customers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why do you need a NAVRUF navigation? Many GPS units are designed with small screens, but if you're that age where you need reading glasses, putting your reading glasses in place to read the screen, then removing them for driving is a distraction, so you need a GPS navigator with a large display.When you use your mobile phone as a navigation, but sometimes you travel to some areas that have no network and can't find your way back. This GPS is a good addition to your car to ensure you never get lost again.NAVRUF 9" GPS Navigation is a very nice looking product with a lot of features. This is a must have for any trucker who needs a GREAT GPS system.

Features: ✔ Preloaded map of 52 countries in Europe ✔ Lifetime Free Map Update ✔ Maps for North America, South America, Africa, Middle East, Australia and Asia are available ✔ Supports voltage from 12V to 24V for car, passenger car, truck, ambulance, bus, taxi, etc ✔ 12 GPS channels for position search ✔ Speed monitoring and speeding reminder ✔ Apps: games, mp3, mp4, multimedia players, calculators, unit converters, etc. ✔ The navigation voice can be synced to the car player via FM ✔ Multi-language: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Finnish, Polish, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Romanian etc Attention: Please keep the battery fully charged before downloading the maps, or you will not be able to download or update maps.Please keep the navigation device connected to the car charger when the built-in battery is mainly used for emergencies. It can only be used for 30 minutes.Please keep the navigation device connected to the car charger when the built-in battery is mainly used for emergencies. It can only be used for 30 minutes.2014 is the technical version number, not the card version number. The navigation map you received is the latest one, don't worry!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast set up, accurate, great price point
reviews.reviewText: There were so many GPS units to look at on Amazon- I basically selected the highest rated one even though I secretly felt more comfortable with a Garmin unit because I use a Garmin running watch and it's fantastic. So we were literally heading out the door to drive 6 hours away when my amazon package arrived. Perfect timing. I was afraid it would take a long set up or need wifi to update or something. However after I turned it on I set the time to GPS time and entered the location and mounted it to the windshield with the included hardware and away we went. This is the way it should work. Very happy. We've used it a few times and there are some backwoods mountain areas where the GPS veers off the highway a bit, but never for more than 30 seconds and it doesn't affect my driving. The only thing I would recommend is if we could dim the screen even more. Driving at night, even at the lowest setting, the screen is pretty bright so it's not a super smooth transition going from the GPS unit to the dark road. That's my only critique. Otherwise it works well as advertised. Touch screen is responsive and perfect size. Less than $60. Do you have any idea what our forefathers had to do for navigation??? Thanks so much. Oh, the default speed limit warning was annoying but I quickly turned it off. Never had to look at the instruction manual which is nice when the software is intuitive and self explanatory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars On/off doesn’t even hold a charge!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this product it goes often on at times sometimes it’s trying to find the satellite and it cannot and the biggest thing is it doesn’t even charge stay charged whatsoever. It only works when it wants to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Accurate, outstanding quality and ease of use on this GPS.
reviews.reviewText: Updating my review: I’ve now been using the GPS since October and am still loving it. It’s provided more accurate directions than either of the maps apps I have on my phone. I wouldn’t hesitate to buy this. Spend $57.00 on this very options-filled GPS or spend an extra $2000.00 to have a factory GPS in your vehicle when you buy it. There’s nothing to not like about this GPS. The touch screen is as good as the touch screen in my girlfriend’s Denali Acadia and it responds as fast if not faster. The suction mount for the dash keeps it securely in place and it doesn’t vibrate when on a bumpy road. It also has a shroud that covers the sides and root to keep any sun glare out. The screen is nice and bright and a perfect size for an add-on GPS. I’m amazed at the quality and sturdiness of it. I figured I wouldn’t get much for $57.00 but it was to my surprise that I was way wrong. I’m buying a few more for my family members that do t already have one. I would highly recommend this to anyone even thinking about buying a GPS for their vehicle because you will be as pleasantly surprised as I was when you get it. What a great add-on for my Ford Edge!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Dislike: the visor/sunscreen or whatever you wish to call it does not work with the suction attachment piece. No instructions for assembling all the little plastic pieces. After reviewing the entire instruction pamphlet, we used the "your best guess" method. They also do not provide definitions for unusual terms, like the instructions for the LORRY.. What the heck is that! Not a common term in my area.Like: Haven't had a need to use the GPS yet but did play with it. And it is more user friendly than our old one (different brands of course). I believe we will enjoy this GPS more than the last one we had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too much screen glare.
reviews.reviewText: As the title says, too much glare. The screen is so reflective it's like a mirror and I couldn't see the screen a lot of the time. Night time isn't so bad but they really need a dull finish screen like computer monitors. The owners manual is small and very tough to read with such small print. The manual doesn't cover everything about this GPS. As with all GPS units there is too much bloatware. The connection for holding the unit to the windshield, on the back of the GPS, is cheesy and falls off on rougher roads. Luckily I had a sturdier clamp type of holder to replace it. The biggest problem though remains the excessive amount of glare on the screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Could not insert the house number into the address bar
reviews.reviewText: I do not normally write a review, but after calling Amazon about the problem I was told others were having the same problem, that is "not able to insert the house number into the address." Why did I need the NAVRUF? I Drive a 2016 Corvette Stingray, and it already has On Star installed (at a fee $30/month). I would not want to be without it. I purchased the Corvette New, with the On Star installed. However, recently I try to start the car, and it would not start. I contacted On Star, and within minutes a technician was there to help. He believed the car needed a new battery. He installed a new battery. The car still would not start. So I had to have the car towed to the dealer. All of the above was covered financially by On Star. It was a Friday so the dealer was not able to work on the car until Monday. But, I needed a car. So I rented one. It did not have a GPS system, so I tried using internet Maps. I got lost. It was then that I realized I needed a portable GPS. I selected the NAVRUF primarily because of the 9 inch screen. At First I purchased the Chinese version. That was like someone else indicated, “JUNK”. Then I noticed there was an American Version so I purchased that one, again because of the 9 inch screen. Then I ran into the Problem. "The new NAVRUF would not let me insert the house number for my destination." I fooled around for hours trying to install another map into the GPS, and could not. I was ready to send this one back to Amazon. Then I decided to try one more time to install the house number. I went to the website (it was a CVS), and typed in for the street NAME, exactly the way the STREET NAME appears on the Website. In this case it read "E Flamingo Rd" after doing that I was able to install the house number. Now I am living Happily ever After!
Va très bien pour un bon prix
